name: Reflect
description: The first decentralized synthetic market built on Base. Bringing abundant assets to all, on Base, Create, trade, and manage digital assets reflecting the value of assets from other blockchains Empowering everyone with maximum assets on Base, Layer 2 for the people. Trade synthetics in 3 easy steps 1- Open a vault - Deposit your collateral and mint the desired rAsset 2- Manage your position - Your dashboard to manage all your current positions 3- Claim collateral - Withdraw your collateral any time you want
